lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Regard/Troye Sivan/Tate McRae/Koda/Siba/Tom Mann/Isaac Sakima
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Regard/Troye Sivan/Tate McRae/Koda/Siba/Tom Mann/Isaac Sakima
[00:02.046]Troye Sivan:
[00:02.047]Yeah
[00:03.405]All I see is you, is you, is you
[00:07.427]I do, ooh, yeah
[00:08.593]
[00:08.819]Troye Sivan:
[00:08.820]How could you ever leave me without a chance to try
[00:15.342]How can I be sorry if I don’t know the crime
[00:20.250]I should be mad cos you never told me why
[00:23.823]Still, I can't seem to say goodbye
[00:27.451]
[00:28.903]When I try to fall back I fall back to you
[00:33.453]When I talk to my friends I talk about you
[00:37.986]When the Hennessy’s strong all I see is you, is you, is you, I do
[00:43.696]
[00:47.097]No I haven’t moved on but trust me I tried
[00:51.667]If I give you a call don’t hang up the line
[00:56.179]When the Hennessy’s strong all I see is you, is you, is you, I do
[01:01.835]
[01:12.772]Tate McRae:
[01:12.773]I’m good at overthinking
[01:14.930]But I haven’t even got this far
[01:17.107]All I know is that my mind is
[01:19.291]In the backseat of your corvette car
[01:21.638]You got me at my baddest
[01:23.711]And you got me round your fingertip
[01:26.121]Should be fed up with your bullshit
[01:27.934]But everything about you
[01:28.977]No, I can’t resist
[01:30.305]
[01:30.466]How could you ever leave me without a chance to try
[01:36.960]How can I be sorry if I don’t know the crime
[01:41.584]I should be mad that you never told me why
[01:45.906]Still, I can't seem to say goodbye
[01:49.008]
[01:50.543]Troye & Tate:
[01:50.544]When I try to fall back I fall back to you
[01:55.038]When I talk to my friends I talk about you
[01:59.561]When the jealousy’s strong all I see is you , is you, is you, I do
[02:08.626]No I haven’t moved on but trust me I tried
[02:13.068]If I give you a call don’t hang up the line
[02:17.564]When the jealousy’s strong all I see is you, is you, is you, I do
[02:23.087]
[02:30.884]Tate McRae:
[02:30.885]Is you, oh, ooh-woah, oh, you
[02:38.899]Is you, is you, I do, ooh
[02:42.637]
[02:42.638]I see your face in every stranger everywhere I go
[02:47.025]I hear your voice in conversations every word you spoke
[02:51.873]Nearly blocked you on my phone about a thousand times
[02:58.169]I know I should say goodbye
[03:01.499]
[03:07.428]I know I should say goodbye
[03:10.659]
[03:11.933]When I try to fall back I fall back to you
[03:16.436]When I talk to my friends I talk about you
[03:20.921]When the Hennessy’s strong all I see is you , is you, is you, I do
[03:30.175]No I haven’t moved on but trust me I tried
[03:34.515]If I give you a call don’t hang up the line
[03:39.232]When the Hennessy’s strong all I see is you, is you, is you, I do
tlyric:
[00:02.046]
[00:02.047]
[00:03.405]我眼中唯你一人
[00:07.427]我心甘为你沉沦
[00:08.593]
[00:08.819]
[00:08.820]你怎能不给我留 稍作尝试的余地
[00:15.342]既然我不明所犯的错 怎向你表达歉意
[00:20.250]本该因你无故说辞而愤恨
[00:23.823]可我仍 难诉别离
[00:27.451]
[00:28.903]欲退却步伐 怎料又落入你甜蜜圈套
[00:33.453]同好友交谈 话题皆是你
[00:37.986]轩尼诗酒意正浓 恍惚唯你在眼前
[00:43.696]
[00:47.097]请相信我 我曾竭力过 却仍未释怀
[00:51.667]若我向你致电 请不要挂断
[00:56.179]轩尼诗酒意正浓 恍惚唯你在眼前
[01:01.835]
[01:12.772]
[01:12.773]我总想入非非
[01:14.930]可却从未料想
[01:17.107]脑海中仅剩
[01:19.291]坐于你炫酷红跑车后座
[01:21.638]我却因你 举止失态
[01:23.711]你将我玩弄于股掌间
[01:26.121]本早已受够此般胡言
[01:27.934]可关于你的点滴
[01:28.977]我都难以抗拒
[01:30.305]
[01:30.466]你怎能不给我留 稍作尝试的余地
[01:36.960]既然我不明所犯的错 怎向你表达歉意
[01:41.584]本该因你无故说辞而愤恨
[01:45.906]可我仍 难诉别离
[01:49.008]
[01:50.543]
[01:50.544]欲退却步伐 怎料又落入你甜蜜圈套
[01:55.038]同好友交谈 话题皆是你
[01:59.561]妒心甚重 只看得见你一人
[02:08.626]请相信我 我曾竭力过 却仍未释怀
[02:13.068]若我向你致电 请不要挂断
[02:17.564]妒心甚重 只看得见你一人
[02:23.087]
[02:30.884]
[02:30.885]唯独你一人
[02:38.899]仅你一人
[02:42.637]
[02:42.638]无论我身处何方 人潮中你的面孔 总恍然可见
[02:47.025]你往昔所说的话 总萦绕耳畔 难以挥散
[02:51.873]我无数次拉黑你的电话号码
[02:58.169]早知如此 就应同你分道扬镳
[03:01.499]
[03:07.428]才恍悟 自己早该同你告别
[03:10.659]
[03:11.933]欲退却步伐 怎料又落入你甜蜜圈套
[03:16.436]同好友交谈 话题皆是你
[03:20.921]轩尼诗酒意正浓 恍惚唯你在眼前
[03:30.175]请相信我 我曾竭力过 却仍未释怀
[03:34.515]若我向你致电 请不要挂断
[03:39.232]轩尼诗酒意正浓 恍惚唯你在眼前
